name: SafeSearch
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
SafeSearch
description:
SafeSearch

A set of features pertaining to the image, computed by various computer vision methods over safe-search verticals (for example, adult, spoof, medical, violence).

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"

safe_search = image.safe_search
safe_search.spoof? #=> false
safe_search.spoof #=> :VERY_UNLIKELY

methods.name: adult
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
SafeSearch#adult
methods.description: Adult likelihood rating. Possible values are VERY_UNLIKELY, UNLIKELY, POSSIBLE, LIKELY, and VERY_LIKELY.

methods.name: adult?
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
SafeSearch#adult?
methods.description: Adult likelihood. Returns true if #adult is POSSIBLE, LIKELY, or VERY_LIKELY.

methods.name: spoof
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
SafeSearch#spoof
methods.description: Spoof likelihood rating. Possible values are VERY_UNLIKELY, UNLIKELY, POSSIBLE, LIKELY, and VERY_LIKELY.

methods.name: spoof?
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
SafeSearch#spoof?
methods.description: Spoof likelihood. Returns true if #spoof is POSSIBLE, LIKELY, or VERY_LIKELY.
